statements: SELECT * FROM performance_reviews;
SELECT review_date, employee_id, rating FROM performance_reviews;
SELECT reviewer_id, feedback FROM performance_reviews WHERE rating > 4.0;
SELECT employee_id, rating, feedback FROM performance_reviews WHERE review_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM performance_reviews WHERE employee_id = 101 AND reviewer_id = 201;
SELECT * FROM performance_reviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY review_date DESC
SELECT employee_id, reviewer_id, rating FROM performance_reviews WHERE employee_id = 1001 AND reviewer_id = 2001
SELECT review_id, review_date, feedback FROM performance_reviews WHERE review_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY rating ASC
SELECT DISTINCT reviewer_id FROM performance_reviews WHERE rating < 3
SELECT * FROM performance_reviews WHERE feedback LIKE '%positive%'
SELECT * FROM Performance_Reviews;
SELECT review_id, employee_id, performance_score FROM Performance_Reviews WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT reviewer_id, review_date FROM Performance_Reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Feedback WHERE feedback_author = 'John Doe';
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM Feedback ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Performance_Reviews WHERE review_id = 123;
SELECT review_id, employee_id, performance_score FROM Performance_Reviews WHERE performance_score > 90;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM Feedback WHERE feedback_author = 'John Doe';
SELECT employee_id, reviewer_id, review_date FROM Performance_Reviews WHERE review_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT Performance_Reviews.review_id, Feedback.feedback_text FROM Performance_Reviews JOIN Feedback ON Performance_Reviews.review_id = Feedback.review_id;
SELECT * FROM performance_reviews;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employees;
SELECT department_name, manager_id FROM departments;
SELECT review_id, rating, feedback, review_date FROM performance_reviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, department FROM employees WHERE department='IT';
SELECT * FROM performance_reviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM performance_reviews WHERE feedback LIKE '%improvement%';
SELECT review_id, rating, review_date FROM performance_reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT employees.first_name, employees.last_name, departments.department_name FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.department = departments.department_id;
SELECT employees.first_name, employees.last_name, performance_reviews.rating FROM employees JOIN performance_reviews ON employees.employee_id = performance_reviews.reviewer_id;
SELECT * FROM performance_reviews;
SELECT employee_id, review_date, performance_rating FROM performance_reviews WHERE review_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT reviewer_id, first_name, last_name FROM reviewers ORDER BY first_name ASC, last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM performance_reviews PR JOIN reviewers R ON PR.reviewer_id = R.reviewer_id WHERE PR.performance_rating > 3 ORDER BY PR.review_date DESC

SELECT PR.review_id, PR.employee_id, PR.review_date, R.first_name AS reviewer_first_name, R.last_name AS reviewer_last_name FROM performance_reviews PR JOIN reviewers R ON PR.reviewer_id = R.reviewer_id WHERE PR.performance_rating < 3 AND R.department = 'Sales'

SELECT PR.review_id, PR.review_date, E.first_name AS employee_first_name, R.first_name AS reviewer_first_name FROM performance_reviews PR JOIN employees E ON PR.employee_id = E.employee_id JOIN reviewers R ON PR.reviewer_id = R.reviewer_id WHERE PR.review_date >= '2022-01-01'

SELECT PR.review_id, R.department AS reviewer_department, COUNT(F.feedback_id) AS feedback_count FROM performance_reviews PR JOIN reviewers R ON PR.reviewer_id = R.reviewer_id JOIN feedback F ON PR.review_id = F.review_id GROUP BY PR.review_id, R.department ORDER BY feedback_count DESC

SELECT PR.review_id, PR.performance_rating, PR.review_date, F.feedback_text FROM performance_reviews PR JOIN feedback F ON PR.review_id = F.review_id WHERE PR.review_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM performance_reviews;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT reviewer_name FROM reviewers WHERE department = 'Finance';
SELECT AVG(performance_rating) AS avg_rating FROM performance_reviews;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM performance_reviews WHERE performance_rating > 4.5;
SELECT reviewer_name, department FROM reviewers ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT employee_name, department, joining_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT pr.review_id, pr.performance_rating, f.feedback_text FROM performance_reviews pr JOIN feedback f ON pr.review_id = f.review_id;

SELECT pr.review_id, pr.performance_rating, e.employee_name, r.reviewer_name FROM performance_reviews pr JOIN employees e ON pr.employee_id = e.employee_id JOIN reviewers r ON pr.reviewer_id = r.reviewer_id ORDER BY pr.review_date DESC;
